headline: PMI is Invested in America: Already Over $20 Billion of U.S.-Related Investments with Significant Further Amounts Planned
summary: STAMFORD, CT, January 15, 2026--Philip Morris International (NYSE: PM) and its U.S. businesses (PMI U.S.) are strongly committed to investing in America, with over $20 billion of PMI investments since 2022 majority-related to both acquiring and further investing in U.S. manufacturing capabilities, commercial rights and infrastructure, and U.S. jobs.
